name: Waterpark: Slide Race
description:
Enjoy this summer with Waterpark: Slide Race game. Just have fun racing game with spectacular EDM rhythm game experiences.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Hold Drag your finger to move
- Bump other guys and coin, AVOID traps
- Feel the music beats to prepare for a slide
- Try to ovoid traps on the water slide

MAIN FEATURES:

- Import your own favorite songs and enjoy the music with this fascinating
- Lively 3D design
- Over 20+ skin of character and float
- Simple game-play and 1-hand control
- Popular music songs


Let us bring you your best relaxing time!
